label: 太政大臣
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: The highest possible civil post (first rank or junior first rank), one not provided for in the government’s nominal table of organization.  In theory it was filled only by a candidate able to serve as an example of virtue, and the incumbent was to be above actual administration.[Also read  Daijō Daijin][RK]
